
# temp-log v1.0.0 [![stable](http://badges.github.io/stability-badges/dist/stable.svg)](http://github.com/badges/stability-badges)

This is for simple logging inside other libraries that are depended on by [`lotus-log`](https://github.com/aleclarson/lotus-log).

This logger is replaced when [`lotus-log`](https://github.com/aleclarson/lotus-log) is first required.

Compatible with both NodeJS and React Native.

usage
-----

```CoffeeScript
{ log, ln } = require "temp-log"

log.verbose "IN VERBOSE MODE!"

log.debug "IN DEBUG MODE!"

log.warn "Get back, Jo Jo!"

log.error Error "Something died."

# A platform-independent new-line character.
log ln

# A smart line separator. Alligators not included.
log.moat 2
```
